docs.title: What is OhMyPosh?
docs.text: OhMyPosh is a theme engine for Powershell that allows you to customize your terminal's look and feel. It is a cross-platform tool that works on Windows, MacOS, and Linux. It is a very powerful tool that allows you to customize your terminal to your liking. It is also very easy to use and install.

docs.title: GitHub Codespaces DevContainer
docs.text:
• What is a DevContainer?
  • How to use a DevContainer

docs.title: What is a DevContainer?
docs.text: A DevContainer is a Docker container that is used to develop applications. It is a lightweight, portable, and secure way to develop applications. It is a great way to develop applications in a consistent environment.

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: This document describes the CI/CD process for the infrastructure code.

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate

pip install mkdocs-material
pip install mkdocs-minify-plugin
pip install mkdocs-glightbox

mkdocs serve

Use again:

source venv/bin/activate
mkdocs serve
